long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to manage your kindle books easily likes any file manager.

- Visit Amazon webbsite
- Go to "Manage Your Content and Devices"
- Click "Books Manager" to open Kindle Books Manager
* Only support amazon.cn and amazon.co.jp now
